FuncDef:
The peer advertise-community command configures a device to advertise community attributes to its peer.
The undo peer advertise-community command cancels the existing configuration. The peer advertise-community command configures a device to advertise community attributes to its peer. The undo peer advertise-community command cancels the existing configuration. By default, a device does not advertise community attributes to any peer.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv4 address of a peer.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo: The peer advertise-community command configures a device to advertise community attributes to its peer.
